{"id":728489540,"lang":"cpp","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1655905530,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/728489540/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        int left =0 ;\n        int right =0 ;\n        map <char ,int> m;\n        int ans =0;\n        while(right <n){\n            char ch = s[right];\n            if(m.count(ch)>0){\n                left = m[ch]+1;\n            }\n            ans = max(ans ,right-left+1);\n            m[ch]= right ;\n            right ++;\n        }\n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
